actions.committee: Senate Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition and Forestry
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition and Forestry.

official_title: A bill to amend the Packers and Stockyards Act of 1921.

summary.text: Amends the Packers and Stockyards Act of 1921 to restrict the authority of the Secretary of Agriculture to determine the justness or reasonableness of any stockyard service rate or charge, to only those rates or charges for services at stockyards which have a certain minimum annual sales volume.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Packers and Stockyards Act of 1921.
